name: Arun Kirubarajan
bio: Hey there, I'm Arun and I'm currently leading efforts in data science and people management. Previously, I was the team lead for Platform and Penn Clubs! Outside of Penn Labs I also research machine learning in Penn's [NLP Group](http://penn-nlp.github.io/) and I teach CIS 192 (Python) at Penn. Other than that, I like skateboarding,  brewing coffee, and watching cartoons!
